channel.title: Rate my site!

Please also tell me why you rated it the way you did

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:9, topic:169653”][quote author=Niall link=topic=229396.msg2049161#msg2049161 date=1202849796]
Web development is about fast, clean and simple webpages, you don’t need an over elaborate website with highres images,
[/quote]

I agree with the fast and clean comment but simple? Where did you get that idea? A simple design is good sometimes but simple code is pretty crap.

http://www.vegaone.de/booyakasha/ Boner pl0x?[/quote]

Yeah, I rewrote it, simple wasn’t what I was suppose to say.

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

0/10.

Images took a while to load, probably because their format is bmp. Web development is about fast, clean and simple webpages, you don’t need an over elaborate website with highres images, and having the wrong format images can make it slower as well, png or even a highres jpg would be better. As well as that, bright red and blue hurt the eyes, you got blue links on a red background as well, and you didn’t do a good job on the graphics.

Main page:
Images need more work.

And finally, use Notepad++ or something to make a website, don’t use an “automatic generator”, or a “WYSIWYG(What You See Is What You Get)” editor. They won’t display the same on different browsers/operating systems, or different resolutions, and by the time you’ve fiddled with it enough so it works on all 3 combinations, you could have done it in a text editor and have 100% cleaner code that would work properly first time, if not, after a few tweaks. On top of that, maintenance and upgrading would be easier, and you’ll save time in the long run.

As for images, use gif, jpg or png, never use anything else. bmp may look better than jpg, but png is another lossless format, the only downside is transparent pngs won’t display correctly in Internet Explorer.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my site!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

I’m only doing this because you’re in diar need of help.

This isn’t a website. It’s three images uploaded. With an enter link pasted in.
It has no content. It has no colour scheme. It has nothing.

Learn html. The easiest programming language.
Make a website. Come back.

Moparisthebest isn’t the place to most things like this. It’s not like people here aren’t welcoming to newcomers. It’s newcomers who haven’t put ANY effort into learning HTML, repetitively asking questions, that we get annoyed by. Use google.

-JV

Read full topic
